answers.answer: I think they check it everytime. (They check for protein in your urine) at least mine does. You can always ask.
It's something that's monitored by symptoms.
Oh okay, they do check for protein eveytime I just didnt know thats how they would know lol thank you momma!

question: Do you at some point always get checked for it or is it something you have to request to be checked for
title: preeclampsia
